trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the compensation handler of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Una actividad utilizada para invocar explícitamente el identificador de compensación de una <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> que contiene el <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> de esta actividad <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" />.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> que contiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> para este objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity explicitly invokes the compensation handler of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se especifica la propiedad <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> del objeto <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>, la actividad <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> invoca explícitamente el identificador de compensación del objeto <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, que devuelve el <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity invokes the default compensation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: Cuando no se especifica la propiedad <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> del objeto <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>, la actividad <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> invoca la compensación predeterminada para cualquier actividad <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> secundaria en el orden inverso de una realización correcta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: Se produce una excepción <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> si <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> hace referencia a una <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> que se confirmó o se compensó previamente.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es de solo lectura en runtime.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor se establece en tiempo de ejecución, se produce una <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
